name: Criminal Cage
description:
Punish the officer at the end of life!
Game Contents
The game is first person escape game
Gameplay contains 3 phases
1. Investigate objects in the scene, find the way to unlock the cage.
2. After unlocking, escape the cage and capture the officer.
3. Enjoy HER! But keep your eyes on the gauges, don't be too rude!
Game Feature
■ Auto-Save at start of each phase
■ Variant mini games
■ Fully animated scenes
■ 4 positions
■ Unlock Free Mode after clear
